chapter1.title: Name Yourself Again
chapter1.description: Choose a name that feels right for you now.

chapter2.title: Emotion Sorting
chapter2.description: Let's organize your feelings. Sort these emotions into 'positive' and 'negative' categories: Joy, Anger, Sadness, Hope, Fear.

chapter3.title: Choose Your Style
chapter3.description: Your style is a reflection of who you are. Choose an aesthetic that resonates with you: Minimalist, Cottagecore, Kolkata Vintage, Maximalist, Artistic.

chapter4.title: Room Reset
chapter4.description: A cluttered space can lead to a cluttered mind. Let's declutter. Choose one item to remove from your space: Old Clothes, Piled-up Dishes, Unused Gadgets.

chapter5.title: Morning Routine
chapter5.description: A good day starts with a good morning. Choose one small action to add to your morning routine: Drink a glass of water, Stretch for 5 minutes, Write one sentence in a journal.
options: Write one sentence in a journal

chapter6.title: Career Exploration
chapter6.description: What kind of work aligns with your values? Choose a field that interests you: Creative Arts, Helping Professions, Technical Fields, Entrepreneurship.
